title: Let's get your Phone setup
content: You can view our set up guide by following this link https://vodafone.sharepoint.com/sites/UKCompanyphones/Shared%20Documents/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FUKCompanyphones%2FShared%20Documents%2FEmail%20Setup%20Guides%2FEmail%20setup%20for%20new%20starts%2Epdf&parent=%2Fsites%2FUKCompanyphones%2FShared%20Documents%2FEmail%20Setup%20Guides. You can also view our step by step guide for installing Microsoft Authenticator by following this link UK Company phones - ms authenticator installation guide _2_.pdf - All Documents (sharepoint.com). Psst – I’ve added a cheat sheet on all things Android , https://dev.azure.com/vfuk- digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL Wiki/14367/Android-cheat-sheet

title: Let's get your Mac setup
content: You will have received a setup guide with the Mac, this will run through system preferences and use of Self Service and Cisco AnyConnect.This is all the info on the Vodafone Mac build – AKA VIC Build - https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/Digital%20X.wiki/9846/Vodafone-Build-for-MacBooks-(AKA-VIC-Build). I have also added another cheat sheet for you on Mac’s Mac - cheat sheet - Overview (azure.com) https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL%20Wiki/14365/Mac-cheat-sheet . Don’t worry you can thank me later.

title: What do we use?
content: We use Outlook for any official emails and the calendar. Cheat Sheet: https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL Wiki/14881/Outlook- cheat-sheet. We use Teams for day-day communication outside Digital. Cheat Sheet: https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL Wiki/14883/Teams-cheat- sheet. We use Slack for day-day communication within Digital. CheatSheet: https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL Wiki/14884/Slack-cheat- sheet. We use Workplace for online communities across Vodafone. Cheat Sheet: https://dev.azure.com/vfuk-digital/Digital/_wiki/wikis/DXL Wiki/14885/Workplace- cheat-sheet

title: Let’s Get you organised
content: It's a good time to install your favourite IDE, browser, 2FA password manager and any basics you use (e.g. note taking, task tracking)Need Office equipment? We have you covered, visit our office in a box,https://officeinabox.vodafone.co.uk/We also have you covered for software visit our IT Shop https://vodafone.sharepoint.com/sites/officeituk
